metadata.title: CVE-2009-0799 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The JBIG2 decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, CUPS 1.3.9 and earlier, Poppler before 0.10.6, and other products allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted PDF file that triggers an out-of-bounds read.

notes.note: jdstrand> CUPS on Ubuntu uses system pdftops (compiled with --disable-pdftops) sbeattie> ipe uses system pdflatex

criterions.comment: libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
